output.sentences: The table was decorated and heaped with food for the Halloween party.
The Jackolantersn turned out great and looked very spooky.
Hailey bought her mouth-watering shrimp casserole and made Zoe and me go mmmm.
That small blond male is my nephew, Hudson, enjoying the festivities from atop a beautiful girl's lap.
Zoe wore the headband I got her for her birthday and looked awesome.
